name: KML Drop
description: Rapid course mapping by dropping KML files exported from Google Earth or other GIS tools.

prd.problemStatement: Manual area mapping is tedious. Many courses already have KML files from Google Earth. Drag-and-drop KML import enables rapid course digitization.
userStories: As a new user, I want to drop a KML file so that my course is mapped quickly
As a new user, I want to preview the import so that I can verify accuracy
